meanings.definition: A synthetic sugar used as a laxative to treat constipation.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed lactulose to help with my constipation.
meanings.sent2: I took some lactulose to relieve my constipation.
meanings.sent3: After taking lactulose, I felt like my stomach was on a rollercoaster.
meanings.sent4: Lactulose was like a gentle wave, easing my constipation.
meanings.sent5: The sweet taste of lactulose made taking it for constipation a bit easier.

meanings.definition: A medication used to treat hepatic encephalopathy by reducing ammonia levels in the blood.
meanings.sent1: The hospital provided lactulose to manage hepatic encephalopathy.
meanings.sent2: Patients with hepatic encephalopathy often take lactulose to lower ammonia levels.
meanings.sent3: The idea of lactulose fighting ammonia in the blood seemed like a superhero story.
meanings.sent4: Lactulose acted as a shield, protecting the body from high ammonia levels.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of lactulose in reducing ammonia levels was truly remarkable.
